creator: alian@trakus.com
text:
I have an applet running through a sequence of XML files, and every now and 
then a zero length file pops up. If the applet/parser tries to parse it via 
parse( String urlString) then execution of that thread no longer continues.

The parser is required to report fatal error "The root element is required in a 
well-formed document" on zero-length file. The fatal error will stop parsing.
creator: elena@apache.org
